_header: Now Bairns Birds bold and blithe
_description: Against my will I take my Leave — eight 8-line stanzas with ‘…take my leue’ refrain

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Nou Bernes Buirdes bolde and blyþeto blessen ow her nou am I
                    bounde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Crist kepe ow out of cares coldeffor nou is tyme to take my
                    leue
